content:
Hi all, putting out there a proposal for some extensions to implement scoring.
I have an example questionnaire that has the extensions in it, and a test site that shows how it would work.
http://smartq.azurewebsites.net/Home/Survey?questionnaireId=http://sqlonfhir-dstu2.azurewebsites.net/fhir/Questionnaire/demo-scoring&fhirServiceUrl=http://sqlonfhir-dstu2.azurewebsites.net/fhir/&SuppressNav=true

And if it wasn't obvious from the URL, this is the actual Questionnaire:
http://sqlonfhir-dstu2.azurewebsites.net/fhir/Questionnaire/demo-scoring
Note that I used an extension on the Valueset, and yes all this is in the DSTU2 structures.
